name: PayOrNothing
description:
This game was created for Juice Jam 2 

You can support me on Ko-fi, if you like my work.

Development Description
This was my first game jam. The game was created in 9 days (During the game jam) and there are still bugs in it. Only the first level is ready in the game, so don't be surprised to see that the game is so short. All models, code, and idea were created during the game jam by me.

How to play: 
A, D - Move
Space - Jump
LMB - Punch ( Space + LMB - Air punch)
E - Use

Game by PEV
Logo and page design by Iluksa
